content: SeedlyTV EP05 Investments REITs Asked by AnonymousAsked on 23 May 2019How do you prioritize looking the REITS WALE vs its occupancy rate?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Billy Ko, President - Investment Club at Singapore Institute Of TechnologyLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 03 Jun 2019Hi! I feel it's a question of how much revenue can one make from the plot of land. It's very similar to hotels, would you want a higher occupancy or a longer staying guest?But personally I would put WALE as priority because having a longer WALE = securing your occupancy for a longer period of time and I prefer security in my investments whereas even though a building has high occupancy but if tenants move elsewhere / bargain for cheaper rents then it would defeat the purpose as well0 comments0
